alert.note: Alert for Callaway; Gasconade; Montgomery; Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:30PM CDT until April 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...SOUTHEASTERN CALLAWAY...NORTHEASTERN OSAGE AND NORTHWESTERN GASCONADE COUNTIES... At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chamois, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hermann, New Florence, Chamois, Big Spring, Mineola, Gasconade, Mokane, Rhineland, Morrison, McKittrick, Portland, Danville, Americus, Reform, and Steedman. This also includes Deutschheim Historic Site. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 170 and 175. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
